item.title: No title
item.description: I am currently a user experience researcher at Microsoft, in the Surface tablet team. I was previously working in the Developers Division on a variety of things including the Team Foundation Server product for managing large software projects, the Windows 8 development experience, the C++ Developer experience, and the help and community experience. On this website, you will find information about my job as an academic researcher and as a user experience researcher and designer. You can check out the research section for details about my research projects, including myÂ Ph.D. thesis (in English) andmarkerClock
